    • Method Detail

      • loadHome

        @RequestMapping(value="/consumption",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String loadHome(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                                                     org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                     @RequestParam(name="firstDate",required=false)
                                                                                                     java.lang.String date1,
                                                                                                     @RequestParam(name="lastDate",required=false)
                                                                                                     java.lang.String date2)
        This method is called when the home page is loaded it fetches the user object from the session and sends the data to the corresponding view it redirects to the login page should an exception arise
        Parameters:
        session - represents the session object
        model - represents the model paramater to be sent to the view
        date1 - the date object entered to the first date selector
        date2 - the date object entered to the second date selector
        Returns:
        returns the view name

      • refreshHistogramAsync

        @ResponseBody
 @RequestMapping(value="/consumptions",
                method=GET)
public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> refreshHistogramAsync(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                                                                                                                   @RequestParam(name="firstDate",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                   java.lang.String date1,
                                                                                                                                                                   @RequestParam(name="lastDate",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                   java.lang.String date2,
                                                                                                                                                                   @RequestParam(name="viewRange",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                   java.lang.String viewType)
        This method updates the histogram asynchronously It returns the data as a map
        Parameters:
        session - represents the session object
        date1 - the date object entered to the first date selector
        date2 - the date object entered to the second date selector
        viewType - represents the granularity of the view
        Returns:
        returns the data to be put in the updated histogram

      • hourlyView

        @ResponseBody
 @RequestMapping(value="/hourly-view",
                method=GET)
public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> hourlyView(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                                                                                                       org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                                                       @RequestParam(name="date",required=false)
                                                                                                                                                       java.lang.String date)
        This method sends the parameters needed for the hourly-view of the histogram
        Parameters:
        session - represents the session object
        model - represents the model paramater to be sent to the view
        date - represents the day that is going to be visualized hourly
        Returns:
        returns the data to be put in the hourly-view
